generic.no_more_results: You have reached the end of the list

generic.title: An error occurred
generic.message: Please try again later or contact the support.
generic.message_with_data: Please try again later or contact the support: {{message}}

oauth_login_failed.title: Login failed
oauth_login_failed.message: Could not login using Keycloak. Please try again or contact your administrator.

404.title: Page not found
404.message: The page you are looking for has wandered off into space.

5xx.title: Server Error
5xx.message: An error occurred on the server. Please try again later.

reset_password.title: Forgot your password?
reset_password.request_text: Please enter your email address below. You will receive a link to create a new password.
reset_password.mail_sent: If an account with this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
reset_password.invalid_code: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
reset_password.password_updated: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now login.

account.locked_oauth: Your profile is managed by Keycloak and cannot be edited here.
